subject: Dear Friend,Your assistance
body:
Dear Friend,Your assistance is needed to receive the sum of $15
million dollars as next of kin/beneficiary. Get back to me for more
details,Regards,Barrister Edward Ikechi.

subject: Re:   Dear Friend,Your assistance
body:
Dear Edward Ikechi,

I received your message regarding the sum of million dollars. Could you please provide more details about this matter? I would like to understand better what is required of me as the next of kin.

Best wishes,
Crystal
